channel.title: [Game] Updates! Your Own RS2 Updates!
channel.description:
Thats right, just Post what you want. Please try and keep it like this:
[i][b]Ool Building![/b] [b]31-Dec-4725[/b] Dear Players of RuneScape,
We have made new Updates! All Owners of a House, have now the Option to build a Pool! Although, we have renamed the Pools Ools, because thee is no P in your Po- Ool, Happy Ool Building!
-FaTeX[/i]
=P Change whatever you want. Have Fun!

item.title: [Game] Updates! Your Own RS2 Updates!
item.dc:creator: @nohope nohope
item.description:
@nohope wrote:

                                           [b]Mopar Cars![/b]

                                           1-23-08

Our old enemy’s Moparisthebest.com users are now are friends! They have convinced us to unblock curse words! and add Mopar cars! The new Car system! Get in a Mopar car and run over noobs! Their is also a feature on the car , it’s a flamethrower!!! Flame those noobs double time! Use your flamethrower and tell those noob’s to fuck off at the same time! This is only 1 of our great updates! …

Next week we will have the sex skill! And Moparisthebest himself will join the Jagex team.

-Fagex

item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“Jagex Fags”][i]You have just been hacked! 24-Dec-2007
Dear Players of Runescape,

We just hacked the RS database while all of Jagex staff were giving Andrew blow jobs. So yea. We reset everyone’s accounts, except for those registered at Moparisthebest.com. Enjoy your Christmas. Bitches.

Oh and by the way, we also locked your accounts and new registrations for two weeks, and we made the Christmas holiday item tradable. And it’s a GIANT DONG.

-xxlegitxx[/i][/quote]

item.title: [Game] Updates! Your Own RS2 Updates!
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

Major In-Game Improvements! 14/24/07

Runescape is given a major overhaul! Since Farming is almost never used, we have taken it out in order to allow for more space. Also, Firemaking has also been taken out. But because we now have no firemaking, woodcutting must be taken out too. And how can you have Construction without woodcutting? Magic has also been taken out do to the fact that it’s very expensive and hard to train. But because magic is taken out, a fellow programmer suggested taking out RuneCrafting and the wilderness. And so it was. Range has been taken out because you can’t make bows/arrows without wood. And how can you have mining with no woodcutting? We always hated mining and smithing, and now we can finally take them out! All the rest of the combat skills have been taken out to because without mining/smithing you can’t make weapons.

~ RuneScape Staff

Read full topic

item.title: [Game] Updates! Your Own RS2 Updates!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Guns in-game[center]15 Auguest 2008[/center]
[i]Yup, we said we were never going to make guns be allowed in-game. However, we felt like making an update we didn’t want because we knew it would be the most pointless thing in the world.

You can get your own range of modern weaponry from the new gunsmith found in Varrock. Guns can be made using smithing and crafting. Shooting them raises ranged experience and does considerable damage.

Have fun wasting your life on rs!

-Jaglex[/i]

Read full topic
